name: J. Walter Thompson Group
tagline: Advertising Agency in Zoliborz, Warszawa, Poland
description:
We are the first true full-service agency in Poland. We combine years of experience in traditional advertising with a strong digital background.
As a result of our hard work, we have produced exciting projects in new and traditional media. We are also part of the WPP Group.
We are changing constantly and follow daily trends because we do not like downtime and want to continually be producing results. Before starting a project we try to analyze and understand the exact specifications and are never afraid to take on something new.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 3, Angle Alfred de Musset & Abdelkader El Mazini,1st Floor Casablanca
